subject: Re: Propagation seems to be picking up.
author: Wired_Bob
full_text:
> 
> I think it would really be great and helpful, at least to me, if someone
> held an ITC/EVP summit where ONLY people who are interested in this
> technology could get together and participate in round-table discussions
> to share ideas, listen to each other's work...



Sounds like a great idea but the come together can happen here.  All you really need to to is start the thread and invite all interested to join in.   Just my two cents worth.
